billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Expands eligibility for crime victims' compensation to include domestic partners
summary: Expands eligibility for those who receive awards under crime victims' compensation to include a domestic partner; defines domestic partner; further provides for out-of-pocket loss to include the cost of counseling for surviving family members of homicide victims.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to eligibility of domestic partners for compensation from the crime victims' board
